data.title: Spectralink/Polycom: Firmware Update Downloads Page
data.text:
Customer is looking for the latest firmware for their Spectralink/Polycom 3641/3645 wireless phones

I have provided the link below to the Avaya Support Downloads page for Spectralink/Polycom Wireless Products

Customer is looking for the latest firmware for their Spectralink/Polycom 3641/3645 wireless phones

I have provided the link below to the Avaya Support Downloads page for Spectralink/Polycom Wireless Products

Downloads page can be found at support.avaya.com under downloads and the category IP Wireless Phones

3641/3645 H323 Handset Software Release 3 Version 117.058 for Communication Manager and IP Office as of January 2013

https://support.avaya.com/downloads/download-details.action?contentId=C2013117117413380_7&productId=P0258

You can also visit the support.avaya.com downloads site under the product IP Wireless Phone category for additional downloads

https://support.avaya.com/downloads/

For a list of supported Access Points, WLAN Controllers (Wireless Lan Controllers), Software for the WLAN Controllers and Configuration Guides for the APs and WLAN Controllers visit the Polycom/SpectraLink View Certified Products link below and reference 8020/8030 phone types (the 8020/8030 phone types = Avaya 3641/3645 branded phones). http://supportdocs.polycom.com/PolycomService/support/global/documents/support/user/products/voice/VIEW_Certified_Products_Guide.pdf

The SpectraLink/Polycom View Certified Products home page can be found using this link http://support.polycom.com/PolycomService/support/us/support/voice/wi-fi/view_certified.html
